title: Efficient optimization of the synthetic conditions for aerosol-assisted high-quality mesoporous CeO2 powders
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,16704-16712
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA01674B, Paper
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Tatsuo Kimura
The molecular structure of PS-b-PEO is quickly screened by spin-coating a precursor solution optimized for obtaining dried CeO2 powders, thereby successfully yielding highly porous CeO2 powders via temperature-controlled spray-drying.
